src:
Synology je predstavil DiskStation DS120j

05 Nov 2019, 15:33


Idealen izbor za vaš prvi strežnik NAS, s katerim boste učinkovito zavarovali svoje podatke.

Synology je predstavil DiskStation DS120j, kompaktni strežnik NAS z eno režo za vgradnjo diska. DS120j je nadgradnja popularnega DS119j, ki se je izkazal za idealno začetno napravo za hrambo in zaščito digitalnih podatkov.
»Postavitev strežnika NAS DS120j je preprosta, uporabnikom pa omogoča varnostno kopiranje fotografij in video posnetkov, shranjenih na mobilnih napravah,« je izjavil Michael Wang, produktni vodja pri Synology Inc. »DS120j je opemljen z bogatim naborom programov za upravljanje digitalnih podatkov. Vse skupaj pa je zapakirano v majhno ohišje, ki ne bo zasedalo veliko prostora na vaši pisalni mizi.«

Postavite zaščito za vaše občutljive podatke

S pomočjo programa Synology Drive boste preprosto varnostno kopirali podatke, ki jih imate shranjene na vašem osebnem računalniku. S Synologyjevo aplikacijo QuickConnect pa boste imeli varen dostop do svojih podatkov kadarkoli in od koderkoli, ne da bi se morali ukvarjati z zapleteno omrežno konfiguracijo.
Glavne lastnosti vključujejo:

Preprost dostop, organizacija in deljenje datotek
Podpora za Mac Time Machine
Tiho in energetsko učinkovito delovanje


Poganja ga Synology DiskStation Manager

DS120j poganja DiskStation Manager, stabilna platforma za upravljanje podatkov, ki omogoča varovanje podatkov in pomaga izboljšati delovno učinkovitost. Synology je prejel številna medijska priznanja, med drugim se ponaša z najvišjimi ocenami v deseti raziskavi TechTarget Quality Awards, ki jih je prejel za sisteme NAS srednjega razreda, in z izborom PCMag Business Choice Award, ki jo je prejel že šesto leto zapored.
Za več informacij o DS120j, obiščite http://bit.ly/2NfjIrt ali http://bit.ly/2NCRLZA.
Povezave: Xenon forte d.o.o.
text:
Synology introduced the DiskStation DS120j

05 Nov 2019, 15:33


The perfect choice for your first NAS server to effectively protect your data.

Synology has introduced the DiskStation DS120j, a compact, single-slot NAS server. The DS120j is an upgrade of the popular DS119j, which has proven to be an ideal starting device for storing and protecting digital data.
"Setting up a DS120j NAS server is simple, allowing users to back up photos and videos stored on mobile devices," said Michael Wang, product manager at Synology Inc. »The DS120j comes with a wealth of digital data management software. All in all, it's packed in a small case that won't take up much space on your desk. "

Put security on your sensitive information

With Synology Drive, you can easily back up the information you have stored on your PC. With Synology's QuickConnect app, you'll have secure access to your data anytime, anywhere, without having to deal with complex network configuration.
Main features include:

Easy access, organization and file sharing
Mac Time Machine support
Quiet and energy efficient operation


It is powered by Synology DiskStation Manager

The DS120j is powered by DiskStation Manager, a stable data management platform that enables data protection and helps improve work efficiency. Synology has received numerous media awards, including the highest scores in the tenth TechTarget Quality Awards it received for mid-range NAS systems and the PCMag Business Choice Award for the sixth consecutive year.
For more information on the DS120j, visit http://bit.ly/2NfjIrt or http://bit.ly/2NCRLZA.
Links: Xenon forte d.o.o.
